overview: Filmed throughout the bands Asian tour, 'A New Tomorrow' documents PLACEBO's intensively demanding promotional schedule and the 5 shows they played, including the infamous 2nd show at the Japanese 'Summersonic Festival' where Brian collapsed on stage.  Shot by Charlie Targett-Adams and narrated by Brian Molko, 'A New Tomorrow' is both emotional and revealing, allowing unrestricted access into the world of PLACEBO and heart of Brian himself.
title: Placebo: A New Tomorrow
